questionList.questionText: Select the function which returns the absolute value of a number.
Select the function which finds the length of a list.
Select the function which converts a string to lowercase.
Select the function which returns a random number.
Select the function which removes an item from a list.
Select the function which returns the maximum value in a list.
Select the function which counts occurrences of an element in a list.
Select the function which joins a list of strings into a single string.
Select the function which converts an integer to a string.
